original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ṭhitā nisinnassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū ṭhitāḥ nisinnassa dhammaṃ desenti pe

original: “Na ṭhito nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na ṭhitaḥ nisinnassa a gilānassa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Na ṭhitena nisinnassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
analyzed: na ṭhitena nisinnassa a gilānassa dhammaḥ desetabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca ṭhito nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca ṭhitaḥ nisinnassa a gilānassa dhammaṃ deseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
